name: wonton
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of dumpling (= a small piece of dough or pastry wrapped around fish, meat, or vegetables and cooked in oil, steam, or boiling water) that is part of some Chinese dishes, especially soup: We ordered the chicken soup with crispy wontons. Bowls of wontons and spring rolls were laid out on the table. He filled the wonton skins with diced chicken and spices and pinched the pastry together.
More examplesFewer examplesThe soup has a mixture of prawn and pork wontons in it.It's easiest to buy ready made wonton wrappers from a supermarket rather than making them yourself.
